remarks: The inner product on a subspace in terms of the inner product on the parent space.  (Contributed by NM, 28-Jan-2008.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
sspi.y $e |- Y = ( BaseSet ` W ) $.
sspi.p $e |- P = ( .iOLD ` U ) $.
sspi.q $e |- Q = ( .iOLD ` W ) $.
sspi.h $e |- H = ( SubSp ` U ) $.
sspival $p |- ( ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ W e. H ) /\ ( A e. Y /\ B e. Y ) ) -> ( A Q B ) = ( A P B ) ) $.
